::DarkMouse::

She looked at Megatron.  She slightly closed one eye at him and 
frowned at him.  She wanted to ask him why she and Quickstrike were 
abandonded by their fearless leader.  Fear no longer existed in her 
body, anger,hate, and the wanting of revenge governed her mind.
She stood still and glared at Megarton.  She looked over at Black 
Aracnia with a look of, I'm going to kill him, look.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron lands in the clearing of the bunker. Grappler, 
Aerostreak, 
> Guantix, and Paralysis greet him with pointed and loaded pistols.
>     "How can we help you, Megatron?" Paralysis croaked.
>     He snorted and pushed his way past the foursome. "I have a 
meeting with 
> your Commander...." He said, and then mumbled, "And i have a score 
to settle 
> with two little roaches..."
>     He entered the tunnle and proceeded down the corridor looking 
at the dead 
> aliens as he went by. He came to the door and it slid open to 
reveal Aracnia, 
> Tarantulas, Darkmouse, and Quickstrike.
>     "Isnt this the picture I always wanted to see. " He said, "Im 
not here to 
> fight, Im here to get rid of these Aliens. Now point me to he 
nearest 
> computer and we can get this over with quickly, " He then looked to 
> Darkmouse, "as quick as cracking a spine."
>     "Thats enough Megatron! Help us or leave!" Aracnia said as 
Tarantulas 
> laughed himself out of his seat.
>     "Im sorry, indeed I am. I will put old grudges aside and do 
what needs to 
> be done."
> 
>     (Waspinator isnt in command, Kitkat is, until Megatrons return.)
